courseName: Advanced Electronic and Electrical Engineering - MSc
description: Robotics, advanced manufacturing, the internet-of-things, driverless vehicles and medical technologies – we aim to find solutions to real-world challenges.This course is for you if you have a physics or engineering background and wish to work in electronics-based industries.You’ll study in a dedicated MSc laboratory with industry-standard hardware and software.
